segments.text: I'm just watching this kitchen scene unfold quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is carefully drying her plate with the towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet into the full sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It overflows steadily onto the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stands on a stool reaching into the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding the cookie jar lid in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a girl extends her arm toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink frames a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight highlights the dishes stacked on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets show signs of the water damage starting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everyone seems focused on their own little world here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an ordinary moment with a few unexpected twists.
segments.speaker: PAR
